StabilityToolkit 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

bblogist.sim()

Title

dynamic.fit()

General function to fit either the SS model or the HT model

flexss.bootstrappedMLEs()

Maximum Likelihood estimation of the SS model parameters along with Parametric Bootstrap confidence intervals.

HT.bootstrappedMLEs()

Maximum Likelihood estimation of the HT model parameters along with Parametric Bootstrap confidence intervals.

HT.predict()

Computing the fraction over time of the plasmid-free cells in a stability assay

HTdatasim()

Simulates picking colonies data from a serial transfer experiment

joint.negllSS.flex()

joint likelihod from a competition experiment and initial fraction of 0.5 and from a stability assay

joint.vs.sep.fit()

Title

jointflexssMLEs()

Joint Maximum Likelihood estimation of the SS model parameters along with Parametric Bootstrap confidence intervals for competition and stability assay data.

loss.time()

Function to compute the time (in generations) it takes for a plasmid to be lost or quasi-extinct.

negll.bblogist()

Title

negllSS.flex.nobeta0()

Computes the negative log-likelihood for the Segregation Selection model and initial fraction of 0.5

negllSS.flex()

Computes the negative log-likelihood for the Segregation Selection model

negloglikeHT.comb()

Joint likelihood for two different stability assays are the same, assuming Horizontal Transfer

negloglikeHT()

Computes the negative log-likelihood for the Horizontal Transfer model

negloglikeSS.comb()

Joint likelihood for two different stability assays

negloglikeSS()

Computes the negative log-likelihood for the Segregation Selection model

pairwise.fitHT()

Joint estimation of the HT model parameters

pairwise.fitSS()

Joint estimation of the SS model parameters

SS.predict()

Computes the solution of the difference equation for the fraction of plasmid-free cells for the Segregation Selection model.

SSdatasim()

Simulates picking colonies data from a serial transfer experiment
